name: Amish Brothers
description:
Visit Amish Brothers at Levi D. Smith Games

Brothers Ezekiel and Abram have left brother Jebidiah alone to run the farm today.
Oh no! Last night a huge storm came through and startled the farmyard animals.
The animals have escaped from the barn.
Help brother Jebidiah gather all the animals before they stray too far away.
